Text: I'd like to make changes to the project json - and If you understand the protocol I'm describing please reply either Yes, or No to this first prompt.Â  After that, I'll discuss changes with you, and if you have any questions about the change, please ask them, otherwise, just return an array of 1 or more json patches to modify the SSoT json as requested.
